001package eu.andredick.tools;
002
003import eu.andredick.scp.SCProblem;
004import eu.andredick.scp.Structure;
005import org.ujmp.core.DenseMatrix;
006import org.ujmp.core.Matrix;
007import org.ujmp.jmatio.ImportMatrixMAT;
008
009import java.io.File;
010import java.io.IOException;
011
012public class MatConvert {
013
014    /**
015     * 通过.mat文件导入覆盖矩阵，并设置所有子集权重为1<br>
016     * .mat文件应放置在指定路径下:"resources\mat\"
017     * @param mat_name      文件名
018     * @return              SCP问题实例
019     */
020    public static SCProblem Mat_to_SCP (String mat_name){
021        String matPath = "resources\\mat\\";
022        File file = new File(matPath + mat_name);
023        Matrix data = null;
024        try {
025            data = ImportMatrixMAT.fromFile(file);
026        } catch (
027                IOException e) {
028            throw new RuntimeException(e);
029        }
030        boolean[][] Coverage = data.toBooleanArray();
031        Structure structure = new Structure(Coverage);
032        int cols = structure.subsetsSize();
033        Matrix objC = DenseMatrix.Factory.ones(1,cols);
034        float[] objCoeff = objC.toFloatArray()[0];
035        SCProblem problem = new SCProblem(Coverage, objCoeff);
036        return problem;
037    }
038
039
040
041
042}
